Flat violin geom by Ben Marwick

Source: R/geom_flat_violin.R
geom_flat_violin.Rd

Create flat violin plot with ggplot2 with geom_flat_violin. Shamelessly copy-pasted from Ben Marwick.

geom_flat_violin(
  mapping = NULL,
  data = NULL,
  stat = "ydensity",
  position = "dodge",
  trim = TRUE,
  scale = "area",
  show.legend = NA,
  inherit.aes = TRUE,
  ...
)

Arguments

mapping

A value
data

A value
stat

A value
position

A value
trim

A value
scale

A value
show.legend

A value
inherit.aes

A value
...

A value

Examples


ggplot2::ggplot(ggplot2::diamonds, ggplot2::aes(cut, carat)) +
 ggplot2::coord_flip() +
 geom_flat_violin()
